Description: Welcome to Heritage Park Apartments! Nestled in a quiet wooded area, we have spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes. Most of our apartments are newly renovated. Each apartment has a beautiful brick accent wall in the dining room, with plenty of closet space and a large living room. Most of the apartment homes have floor to ceiling windows in the living/dining room area that open up to a huge balcony or patio. We pay for your gas heating and cooking, water, sewer and trash removal. We also have free parking and we are convenient to the beltway and the Metro. * Prices are subject to change.

Description: At The Delano Apartments you will enjoy no security deposit! With our beautiful 1 bedroom/1 bath with den and 2 bedroom/2 bath apartments in this new apartment Community, you will have a nice-sized kitchen with dishwasher, attached microwave, washer and dryer, large size bathrooms, new carpeting, and ceramic tiles.Put on your running shoes and let The Delano Apartments fitness center be your place to exercise and relax after with our rest area. Feel free to park anywhere on the lot with our free covered parking. Main entrances come with an Intercom that will go directly to your phone! Transportation is not an issue at The Delano Apartments. We are located on the University of Maryland Shuttle Line and metro area! Come see how the Delano Apartments can be your home! No security deposit!

Dogs and Cats Allowed:
Acceptable animals include domestic cats, fish (max. tank size: 50 gallons), birds and dogs. Dogs that are purebreds or mixes of the following breeds are prohibited: Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Chow-Chow, Doberman, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Pit Bull (American Staffordshire Terrier, American Pit Bull Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier), Rottweiler, Saint Bernard, Shar Pei, and Siberian Husky. All other animals including exotic pets are prohibited. All animals must be authorized by Management.

Description: Domain College Park features stylish apartments for rent in College Park, MD. Enjoy gourmet kitchens complete with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, large closets, full-size washer/dryer sets, hardwood flooring, and thoughtful finishes. In addition to upscale features, our College Park apartments offer convenient on-site amenities for our residents. Enjoy access to our state-of-the-art fitness center, resort-style pool, landscaped courtyards, business center, and billiards/TV lounge. Enjoy close proximity to the Metro stop providing convenient access to the best of Silver Spring, Bethesda, and downtown Washington DC. Visit us today for a personalized tour of our remarkable College Park apartments and experience better apartment living in Maryland.Domain College Park was voted "Best Mid-Rise Apartment - Mid-Atlantic 2013" in the 17th Annual Delta Associates Awards for Excellence.

Description: Discover the finest apartments in Adelphi, Maryland at The Communities at Arbor Vista. Our spacious apartment homes offer in-town convenience with the friendly ambiance you will only find in the best neighborhood of Adelphi. We are a lively apartment community, located just few minutes to the inner loop of Capital Beltway 495, the University of Maryland College Park, Prince George's Community College, the U.S. Army Research Laboratory, the National Archives, Wheaton Metro Station, and Prince George's Metro Station. In addition to our unbeatable location, we offer high-end amenities including a new fitness center with cardio equipment, s sparkling swimming pool, convenient outdoor grills, a children's playground, a Shuttle Stop to the University of Maryland, and a extraordinary clubhouse with business center. Call for your personalized tour of The Communities at Arbor Vista!

Description: A reminder of quiet country living with all the advantages of metropolitan living. 3 acres of lush, green grass surround landscaped apartment buildings. 1 & 2 Bedroom Apartments, huge floor plans. Conveniently located just minutes from I-95 and I-495 (the Capital Beltway). Walk to banking, shopping and dining across the street. Metro Bus Line runs in front of the property. 24 hour emergency maintenance.

The large condo features a roomy bedroom with walk-in closet a balcony with great views spacious living and dining areas and a kitchen with stainless steel appliances granite counters & a stacked front-loading washer/dryer. The building has a 24x7 front desk & parking.

Description:
(240) 338-1649 - Beautiful 2BR/1BA Condo in Adelphi, MD (Most Utilities Included!) - Beautiful 2 Bedroom 1 Full Bathroom Condominium in Adelphi, MD. Features parquet flooring throughout a spacious living room/dining room combo with brick accent wall. Fully equipped kitchen features all appliances including gas stove and dishwasher. Condo has plenty of additional storage space, 2 spacious bedrooms including a master bedroom with walk in closet and 1 full bath with tiled floors, tiled shower enclosure and updated fixtures. Condo also has a spacious balcony that is perfect for entertaining! Tenants have access to purchase membership to the community pool!
Water and Gas included in Rent!!
Pets under 30lbs considered on a case by case basis with an additional Pet Deposit!!
Contact Aaron at (240) 338-1649 for details or to schedule an appointment or email athompson@baymgmtgroup.com
Here is the link to apply online:
https://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3508994) Other Amenities - Other- fully equipped kitchen, hardwood floors, walk in closet, partial utilities included, Pool, Balcony. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Range. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Entertain your guests in your separate dining area and relax in your large living room. You will also find spacious closets, ceramic bathrooms, plush wall-to-wall carpeting a conveniently located laundry facilities. Once you step outside of your new home you can enjoy the convenience of being minutes from shop dining and major highways!
